summary: Tara Leigh Patrick , professionally known as Carmen Electra, is an American glamour model, actress, television personality, singer, dancer and sex symbol.
full_text: Tara Leigh Patrick , better known by her stage name Carmen Electra, is an American glamour model, actress, television personality, singer, and dancer. She gained fame for her appearances in Playboy magazine, on the MTV game show Singled Out, on the TV series Baywatch, and dancing with the Pussycat Dolls, and has since had roles in the parody films Scary Movie, Date Movie, Epic Movie, Meet the Spartans, and Disaster Movie. She hosted MTV Spring Break for some time.
title: Carmen Electra
